definition.de: Information über einzelne Firmen, Konzerne und Wohltätigkeitsorganisationen
definition.dk: Oplysninger om individuelle virksomheder, fonde og mere.
definition.en-GB: Information about individual business entities, including companies, corporations, charities
definition.en-US: Information about individual business entities, including companies, corporations, charities
definition.pt-BR: Informação sobre empresas individuais ou companhias de negócios.
definition.pt-PT: Informação sobre empresas individuais ou companhias de negócios.
definition.se: Information om enskilda företag, stiftelser, ekonomiska föreningar med mera.
definition.zh-Hans: 有关单个企业实体的信息，包括公司、慈善机构
